channel.title: ToL Key Giveaway #ThePlex (Open)
channel.description:
# [color=bpurple]To Celebrate being the first person to get a referral sale, I'm hosting a Key Giveaway for Throne of Lies Alpha+[/color]
[color=bpurple]If you want to be apart of this Giveaway, you will need to submit a banner for PodCastleOfLies. It must fit these requirements:[/color]
[color=bpurple]1. **PodCastleOfLies** - Must be the title[/color]
[color=bpurple]2.[/color] [color=red]RED[/color] [color=bpurple]and[/color] [color=grey]GREY[/color] [color=bpurple]color theme[/color]
[color=bpurple]3. @ThePlexGamer and @xCasanora on there[/color]
[color=bpurple]4. twitch.tv/podcastleoflies on there[/color]
[color=bpurple]5. Directly Message me on Discord with your entry[/color]
#[color=bpurple]The winning Banner will recieve a Throne of Lies Alpha+ key. All entries will be featured on the Community Cast on the 15th of July along with the winner announced![/color]

item.title: ToL Key Giveaway #ThePlex (Open)
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
To Celebrate being the first person to get a referral sale, I’m hosting a Key Giveaway for Throne of Lies Alpha+

If you want to be apart of this Giveaway, you will need to submit a banner for PodCastleOfLies. It must fit these requirements:

1. PodCastleOfLies - Must be the title

2. RED and GREY color theme

3. @ThePlexGamer and @xCasanora on there

4. twitch.tv/podcastleoflies on there

5. Directly Message me on Discord with your entry

#The winning Banner will recieve a Throne of Lies Alpha+ key. All entries will be featured on the Community Cast on the 15th of July along with the winner announced!

Read full topic
